text: "Bad Life" is a 1984 song by English alternative rock band Public Image Ltd. It was taken from their fourth studio album This Is What You Want... This Is What You Get and went to number 71 in the United Kingdom. ==Track listing== 7" vinyl # "Bad Life" – 3:50 # "Question Mark" – 4:14 12" vinyl # "Bad Life" – 5:15 # "Question Mark" – 4:14 == References == Category:1984 songs Category:Alternative dance songs Category:Public Image Ltd songs
title: Bad Life (Public Image Ltd song)
